column4: hello, does anybody know a good antispyware for linux?? (of course i know it's practically impossible infect linux with this, but i would like one because sometimes i infected windows computer)
Just download Spyware Terminator on the Windows machine.
Only don't install the Crawler toolbar and you'll be golden.
It has a right click option in Windows Explorer for spyware scanning each individual file as you want to.
